name: Jyrki Pinomaa
title: President
copy: Jyrki Pinomaa is the President of Inclusion Europe. Jyrki has two sons with severe disabilities. Jyrki had been the president for Inclusion Finland, and worked for an association providing housing and services to people with intellectual disabilities.

name: László Bercse
title: Vice-President
copy: László Bercse is the Vice-President of Inclusion Europe, and chair of the European Platform of Self-Advocates. László is also the co-chair of EFOESZ, Hungary.

name: Mateja de Reya
title: Vice-President
copy: Mateja de Reya is the Vice-President of Inclusion Europe representing family members. Mateja is also the director of Zveza Sozitje, Slovenia.

name: Guillaume Jacquinot
title: Secretary-General
copy: Guillaume Jacquinot is a brother to his hister with intellectual disabilities. Guillaume was nominated to the Board by Inclusion Ireland.

name: Jeanne Nicklas-Faust
title: Treasurer
copy: Jeanne Nicklas-Faust is a mother of her daughter with intellectual disabiliteis. Jeanne is also Secretary-General of Lebenshilfe, Germany.

name: Cristina Schiratti
title: Board Member
copy: Cristina Schiratti, a mother to her daughter with intellectual disabilities. Board member of Anffas, Italy.

name: Dana Migaliova
title: Board Member
copy: Dana Migaliova, a mother to her son with intellectual disabilities. President of Viltis, Lithuania.

name: Oswald Föllerer
title: Board Member
copy: Oswald Föllerer, self-advocate with Self-Advocacy Centre in Vienna, Austria.

name: Milan Šveřepa
title: Director
copy: Milan Šveřepa is director of Inclusion Europe. Before joining Inclusion Europe Milan worked on deinstitutionalisation in Czechia and in other countries in Central and Eastern Europe.

name: Josipa Frisčić
title: Communication Officer
copy: Josipa Frisčić is the communication officer at Inclusion Europe. Before joining Inclusion Europe, Josipa worked and volunteered at the Erasmus Student Network.
